Topic.Title: TIC TOC are you ready for the next big drop?

Message.Msg: mho you got the trend right but not the quick big drop. like the titanic the ship of stocks will go down slow. it will take years and lots of pain along the way. looks good for bonds though, even europe..usa gradually losing wealth, losing capitalist drive and incentive. remaining population here has become handout dependent.

Topic.Title: If IBM Announce one time special divident!!!

Message.Msg: With the number of companies moving their dividend payments from 2013 to 2012, looks like the taxes that the government expects will come up short in 2013. The taxes the the government will loose in 2013 has got to be close to a billion. Now the companies are looking to do away with the dividends all together for the next 4 years and just do stock buybacks. The tax lose for that has got to be billions of dollars.

Topic.Title: If IBM Announce one time special divident!!!

Message.Msg: I doubt it. It's the companies with big insider or founder stock ownership like ORCL or Costco who will do it.

Message.Title: Deal will be made before Xmas to resolve the cliff
Message.Msg: Offers and counter-offers, back and forth... Deal will be reached before Xmas (albeit the 11th hour) because the negotiators want to go home for the holidays, and the whole world will be happy! Load up!

Message.Title: We are heading to
Message.Msg: IBM Struggled for direction in the last 4-5 days. As usual, it will run 4 to 5 dollars on the option expiry (weekly) day. So, we are heading to 195 and I wouldn't be surprised to see even 196 on Friday.

Message.Title: SNDK and QCOM
Message.Msg: QCOM great long term investment and SNDK its a great trade also watch CELG and M

Message.Title: special dividend
Message.Msg: im not surprised if ibm pays a special dividend as it has the lowest borrowing cost, shouldbe coming very soon.
I am expecting that they will announce on Friday.

I doubt it. The IBM BOD is very conservative. It's stocks like Oracle & Costco with concentrated insider ownership that are paying special dividends or like ORCL paying 3 dividends in advance -- and ORCL's dividend is only $.06 per Q so it's $.18 being paid to save Ellison about $60 mil of higher tax.
